name: Faisal Kohzad
story: Khalil Ahmed-Khan was born in a small village in Iran. He joined the military at a young age to fight for his country and to provide for his family. He quickly proved himself as a skilled missile specialist and was promoted to Corporal. Khalil is married and has a young daughter who he misses dearly while serving on the front lines. He is a devout Muslim and finds comfort and strength in his faith during the toughest moments of his deployments.
